scripts.docker:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.production:setup: export PATH="/home/hoangdanh2000/.fly/bin:$PATH" && flyctl ssh console -a weekly-report-backend -C 'npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && npx tsx prisma/import-all-data-from-excel.ts'
scripts.production:reset: export PATH="/home/hoangdanh2000/.fly/bin:$PATH" && flyctl ssh console -a weekly-report-backend -C 'npx prisma db push --force-reset --accept-data-loss && npx prisma generate && npx tsx prisma/import-all-data-from-excel.ts'
scripts.production:migrate: export PATH="/home/hoangdanh2000/.fly/bin:$PATH" && flyctl ssh console -a weekly-report-backend -C 'npx prisma migrate deploy'
scripts.production:import: export PATH="/home/hoangdanh2000/.fly/bin:$PATH" && flyctl ssh console -a weekly-report-backend -C 'npx tsx prisma/import-all-data-from-excel.ts'
scripts.production:seed: export PATH="/home/hoangdanh2000/.fly/bin:$PATH" && flyctl ssh console -a weekly-report-backend -C 'npx tsx prisma/seed.ts'
scripts.production:verify: export PATH="/home/hoangdanh2000/.fly/bin:$PATH" && flyctl ssh console -a weekly-report-backend -C 'psql $DATABASE_URL -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = '\''public'\'' ORDER BY table_name;"'
scripts.deploy:prod: export PATH="/home/hoangdanh2000/.fly/bin:$PATH" && npm run build && flyctl deploy --strategy immediate
scripts.monitoring:restart: export PATH="/home/hoangdanh2000/.fly/bin:$PATH" && flyctl apps restart weekly-report-backend
scripts.health:all: npm run health:check && npm run health:api && npm run health:db
scripts.scale:512: export PATH="/home/hoangdanh2000/.fly/bin:$PATH" && flyctl scale memory 512 --yes -a weekly-report-backend
scripts.scale:1024: export PATH="/home/hoangdanh2000/.fly/bin:$PATH" && flyctl scale memory 1024 --yes -a weekly-report-backend
